name: This Mortal Coil
description:
Game made for the Global Game Jam 2021, theme: "Lost and Found"

You are a spirit detective who is investigating the last regret of a ghost tied to this world. Show keepsakes related to the ghost's past and navigate your way through her distant memories. Depending on the order you choose to present the items, the conversation may be easier to traverse. Can you discover the ghost's lingering regrets and bring her peace? 

Click the blue arrows box on the bottom right for the recommended fullscreen experience!

--Controls--

  • Click on objects to investigate and show them to the ghost
  • Use the arrow keys to move your soul towards the ghost's soul in the memory traversal
  • Press the "Esc" key to close the game
